product_description.usage: OneCem is a portland limestone cement meeting the requirements of ASTM C595 Standard Specification for Blended Hydraulic Cement. It is used in a wide variety of concrete construction, including commercial and architectural applications.
product_description.packaging: Regionally available in bulk quantities or bags.
product_description.composition: Calcium silicate based clinker, limestone, and gypsum.
product_description.benefits: Versatile building material suitable for a variety of construction applications.
product_description.limitations: Variables affecting concrete performance require good concreting practices.

applicable_standards: ASTM C595 Standard Specification for Blended Hydraulic Cement
AASHTO M 240 Standard Specification for Blended Hydraulic Cement
lca_information.physical_chemical_properties: Manufactured to conform to all applicable requirements for the designated type of ASTM C595 and AASHTO M 240.

transport_and_installation.requirements: Consult specific project requirements or applicable specifications and guides.
transport_and_installation.preparatory_work: Deliver products in original, unopened containers. Store materials protected from harmful conditions.
transport_and_installation.methods: Proper proportioning, batching, mixing, placing, consolidating, finishing, and curing are critical.
transport_and_installation.safety_precautions: Refer to the applicable Safety Data Sheet (SDS). Avoid direct contact with skin and eyes.
